verses.verse: Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> went <S%H5375>on<s%> his <S%H7272>journey<s%>, and <S%H3212>came<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>people<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%>.

And he <S%H7200>looked<s%>, and behold a <S%H875>well<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>, <S%H7969>and<s%>, behold, there were three <S%H5739>flocks<s%> of <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H7257>lying<s%> by <S%H875>it<s%>; for out of that well they <S%H8248>watered<s%> the <S%H5739>flocks<s%>: and a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> was upon the <S%H875>well<s%>'s <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.

And there were all the <S%H5739>flocks<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%>: and they <S%H1556>rolled<s%> the <S%H68>stone<s%> from the <S%H875>well<s%>'s <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and <S%H8248>watered<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, and <S%H7725>put<s%> the <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> upon the <S%H875>well<s%>'s <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in his <S%H4725>place<s%>.
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H251>them<s%>, My brothers, from <S%H370>where<s%> be you And they <S%H559>said<s%>, Of Haran are <S%H2771>we<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3045>them<s%>, Know you <S%H3837>Laban<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5152>Nahor<s%>? And they <S%H559>said<s%>, We know <S%H3045>him<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7965>them<s%>, Is he well? And they <S%H559>said<s%>, He is <S%H7965>well<s%>: <S%H7354>and<s%>, behold, Rachel his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> with the <S%H6629>sheep<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H2005>Behold<s%>, it is yet <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, neither is it <S%H6256>time<s%> that the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> should be gathered <S%H622>together<s%>: <S%H8248>water<s%> you the <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, and <S%H3212>go<s%> and feed <S%H7462>them<s%>.

And they <S%H559>said<s%>, We <S%H3201>cannot<s%>, until all the <S%H5739>flocks<s%> be gathered <S%H622>together<s%>, and till they <S%H1556>roll<s%> the <S%H68>stone<s%> from the <S%H875>well<s%>'s <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; then we <S%H8248>water<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep<s%>.
And while he <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with <S%H7354>them<s%>, Rachel <S%H935>came<s%> with her <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H6629>sheep<s%>: for she kept <S%H7462>them<s%>.

And it came to <S%H3290>pass<s%>, when Jacob <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H251>brother<s%>, and the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H251>brother<s%>, that <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> went <S%H5066>near<s%>, and <S%H1556>rolled<s%> the <S%H68>stone<s%> from the <S%H875>well<s%>'s <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and <S%H8248>watered<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H251>brother<s%>.
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5401>kissed<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%>, and lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and <S%H1058>wept<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> that he was her <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H251>brother<s%>, and that he was <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>: and she <S%H7323>ran<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> her <S%H1>father<s%>.

And it came to <S%H3837>pass<s%>, when Laban <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8088>tidings<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> his <S%H269>sister<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>, that he <S%H7323>ran<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H2263>him<s%>, and embraced <S%H5401>him<s%>, and kissed <S%H935>him<s%>, and brought him to his <S%H1004>house<s%>. And he <S%H5608>told<s%> <S%H3837>Laban<s%> all these <S%H1697>things<s%>.

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H389>him<s%>, Surely you are my <S%H6106>bone<s%> and my <S%H1320>flesh<s%>. And he <S%H3427>lived<s%> with him the <S%H3117>space<s%> of a <S%H2320>month<s%>.

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, Because you are my <S%H251>brother<s%>, should you therefore <S%H5647>serve<s%> me for <S%H2600>nothing<s%>? <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H4909>me<s%>, what shall your wages be?

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> had <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%>: the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H1419>elder<s%> was <S%H3812>Leah<s%>, and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H6996>younger<s%> was <S%H7354>Rachel<s%>.
<S%H3812>Leah<s%> was <S%H7390>weak<s%> <S%H5869>eyed<s%>; but <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> was <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> and <S%H3303>well<s%> <S%H4758>favoured<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%>; and <S%H559>said<s%>, I will <S%H5647>serve<s%> you <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> for <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> your <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%>.

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, It is <S%H2896>better<s%> that I <S%H5414>give<s%> her to you than that I should <S%H5414>give<s%> her to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>: Stay with <S%H3427>me<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> for <S%H7354>Rachel<s%>; and they <S%H5869>seemed<s%> unto him but a <S%H259>few<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, for the love he had for <S%H160>her<s%>.
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3837>Laban<s%>, <S%H3051>Give<s%> me my <S%H802>wife<s%>, for my <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%>, that I may go in unto <S%H935>her<s%>.
And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> gathered <S%H622>together<s%> all the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%>, and <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H4960>feast<s%>.
And it came to pass in the <S%H6153>evening<s%>, that he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3812>Leah<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> her to <S%H935>him<s%>; and he went in unto her.
And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H2153>Zilpah<s%> his <S%H8198>maid<s%> for an <S%H8198>handmaid<s%>.

And it came to <S%H1242>pass<s%>, that in the morning, <S%H3812>behold<s%>, it was Leah: and he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3837>Laban<s%>, What is this you have <S%H6213>done<s%> unto <S%H5647>me<s%>? did not I serve with you for <S%H7354>Rachel<s%>? wherefore then have you deceived <S%H7411>me<s%>?
And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, It must not be so <S%H6213>done<s%> in our <S%H4725>country<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H6810>younger<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1067>firstborn<s%>.

<S%H4390>Fulfill<s%> <S%H2063>her<s%> <S%H7620>week<s%>, and we will <S%H5414>give<s%> you this also for the <S%H5656>service<s%> which you shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> with me yet <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H4390>so<s%>, and fulfilled her <S%H7620>week<s%>: and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to wife <S%H802>also<s%>.
And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%> his <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> to be her <S%H8198>maid<s%>.

And he went <S%H935>in<s%> also unto <S%H7354>Rachel<s%>, and he <S%H157>loved<s%> also <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> more than <S%H3812>Leah<s%>, and <S%H5647>served<s%> with him yet <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.
And when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H3812>Leah<s%> was <S%H8130>hated<s%>, he <S%H6605>opened<s%> her <S%H7358>womb<s%>: but <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> was <S%H6135>childless<s%>.

And <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H2029>conceived<s%>, and gave birth <S%H3205>to<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>, and she <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>: <S%H3588>for<s%> she <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3588>Surely<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H7200>looked<s%> upon my <S%H6040>affliction<s%>; now <S%H3588>therefore<s%> my <S%H376>husband<s%> will love <S%H157>me<s%>.

And she <S%H2029>conceived<s%> <S%H3205>again<s%>, and gave birth to a <S%H1121>son<s%>; and <S%H559>said<s%>, Because the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H8085>heard<s%> that I was <S%H8130>hated<s%>, he has therefore <S%H5414>given<s%> me this son <S%H7121>also<s%>: and she called his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>.

And she conceived <S%H2029>again<s%>, and gave birth <S%H3205>to<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>; and <S%H559>said<s%>, Now this <S%H6471>time<s%> will my <S%H376>husband<s%> be <S%H3867>joined<s%> unto <S%H3205>me<s%>, because I have born him <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>: therefore was his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3878>Levi<s%>.

And she <S%H2029>conceived<s%> <S%H3205>again<s%>, and gave birth to a <S%H1121>son<s%>: and she <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H6471>Now<s%> will I <S%H3034>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: therefore she <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; and <S%H5975>stopped<s%> having <S%H3205>children<s%>.
